channel.title: Selfhosting on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Selfhosting on Deuts Log

item.title: How to Set Up Picsur with ShareX for Seamless Screenshot Uploading
item.description: A step-by-step guide to set up Picsur with ShareX, complete with tips for generating API keys and configuring the uploader.

item.title: Samba Docker or Native
item.description: This post discusses the advantages of using Docker for Samba over native implementation, highlighting the convenience of portability and easier reinstallation with Docker Compose files. The author reflects on their past experience with native Samba setups and shares resources for a Docker-based Samba implementation.

item.title: Docker Apps to Install
item.description: This post shares the author's inspiration from Jimâ€™s Garage on YouTube and his GitHub repository to try out several Docker applications: Immich, Paperless-ngx, Vikunja, rClone, and Restic.
